com.epimorphics.lda.specs

Class APIEndpointSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epimorphics.lda.specs.APIEndpointSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NamedViews, APIQuery.QueryBasis, EndpointDetails

    public class APIEndpointSpec
extends Object
implements EndpointDetails, NamedViews, APIQuery.QueryBasis
    Encapsulates the specification of the particular List/Set within a particular API.
